fields_of_interest: Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Cosmetic Regulation, ECHA Call for Evidence and Information on the intential uses of Microplastic particles in products of any Kind, EU Working Group on Cosmetics, European Union Observatory for Nanomaterials (EUON), SCCS
organisation_name: The European Federation for Cosmetic Ingredients AISBL (EFfCI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Working Group on Cosmetic Products#E01302#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1302#Member#C#WG COS - Sub- group on Annex III#WG COS - Sub-group Claims#WG COS - CPNP meeting on nanomaterials #WG COS - Sub-group on Skin allergens#WG COS - Sub-group on Annex I #WG COS - Sub-group on Definition of Nanomaterial #Consultation Forum on Access and benefit sharing (ABS)#E03396#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3396#Alternate Member#C#Platform of European Market Surveillance Authorities in Cosmetics#E01465#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1465#Member#C
legal_status: EFfCI is registered in Belgium as AISBL, No  0840.955.059
goals__remit:
EFfCI, established in 2000, represent the manufacturers of chemicals and natural ingredients for the cosmetics industry and advocate the collective interests. 
EFfCI is representing ~ 100 companies, all major suppliers and a great number of small and medium sized enterprises.
